practices.title: UK Land Surveying Best Practices
practices.description: Guidelines for selecting and using CRS for land surveying in the United Kingdom

recommendations.text: Use British National Grid (EPSG:27700) for surveys in England, Scotland, and Wales
Use OSTN15 transformation for converting GNSS data to OSGB36/BNG
Store raw GNSS observations in ETRS89 before transformation
Use Ordnance Survey Net (OS Net) for GNSS corrections
Use ETRS89 directly for new high-accuracy projects

commonMistakes.mistake: Using 7-parameter Helmert transformation instead of OSTN15
commonMistakes.problem: Helmert transformation only accurate to ~5m, OSTN15 accurate to ~0.1m
commonMistakes.solution: Always use OSTN15 for OSGB36/ETRS89 transformations in Great Britain

commonMistakes.mistake: Treating ETRS89 and WGS84 as identical for high-precision work
commonMistakes.problem: Differences accumulate over time due to plate motion (~2.5cm/year)
commonMistakes.solution: Use explicit transformation for sub-metre accuracy requirements

commonMistakes.problem: Northern Ireland is not covered by British National Grid
commonMistakes.solution: Use Irish Transverse Mercator (EPSG:2157) for Northern Ireland

references.description: Guide to coordinate systems in Great Britain

practices.title: INSPIRE Compliance in the UK
practices.description: Guidelines for INSPIRE-compliant spatial data in the UK

recommendations.text: Use ETRS89 (EPSG:4258) for INSPIRE-compliant data exchange
Document coordinate reference system in metadata
Transform legacy OSGB36 data to ETRS89 for publication

commonMistakes.problem: INSPIRE requires ETRS89 for pan-European interoperability
commonMistakes.solution: Transform to ETRS89 using OSTN15 before publication

practices.title: Web Mapping in the UK
practices.description: Guidelines for CRS selection in UK web mapping applications

recommendations.text: Use EPSG:3857 (Web Mercator) for tile-based web maps
Use EPSG:4326 (WGS84) for GeoJSON data exchange
Support BNG grid reference display for UK users
Offer BNG projection option for UK-focused applications

commonMistakes.mistake: Calculating distances or areas in Web Mercator
commonMistakes.problem: Web Mercator significantly distorts distances and areas
commonMistakes.solution: Transform to BNG or use geodesic calculations for measurements
